import React from 'react' import {Form,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { saveShippingAddress } from '../actions/cartAction' const ShippingScreen = () => { const cart =useSelector(state=> state.cart) const navigate =useNavigate() const{shippingAddress}=cart const [address,setAddress]=useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city,setCity]=useState(shippingAddress.city) const [postalCode,setPostalCode]=useState(shippingAddress.postalCode) const [country,setCountry]=useState(shippingAddress.country) const dispatch=useDispatch() const submitHandler=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAddress({address,city,postalCode,country})) navigate('/payment') } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)} > City setAddress(e.target.value)} > Postal Code setPostalCode(e.target.value)} > Country setCountry(e.target.value)} >
) } export default ShippingScreen
